title: Most used API keys
description: Get list of most active API keys in your API Gateway access log group

introBox.headline: How it works
text: CloudWatch Log Insight snippet that returns 10 most actively used API keys.
See snippet GitHub repository for the logging setup instructions.

snippets.title: Copy the code into CloudWatch Logs Insights
